title: Nexus phones from LG and Huawei coming in 2015, report claims | Trusted Reviews
description: ![Nexus 6]()### Alexa’s new whisper mode rolls out in US today – here’s how to enable it](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/how-to-enable-alexa-whisper-mode-echo-3607478 "Alexa’s new whisper mode rolls out in US today – here’s how toenable it")  * During its recent quarterly earnings report, Google admitted the preference ofthe Nexus 6 and Nexus 9 hadn’t been as strong as previous years’ offerings.   **  Read more:[Nexus 9 review](https://www.trustedreviews.com/nexus-9-review)**It’ll be interesting to see how Google offsets and its partners offsets theslump with the next breed of Nexus handsets and Android M.LG of course has experienced previous success in the market with the extremelywell-received Nexus 4 and Nexus 5, but this’ll be the first time Huawei hasbeen enlisted by Google, if the reports turn out to be true.
